pageContext.claim: “So, we have no soldiers in the area. We've been talking to Turkey for three years. They've been wanting to do this for many years, as you know. They've been fighting each other for centuries. They've been fighting each other for -- hundreds of years, this has been going on.”
pageContext.analysis: The United States has about 1,000 soldiers in Syria, and about 50 in the immediate area between Turkey and Kurdish forces.
